title: I can't get revard for quest watch matches
body: I’m already watching the second match of the DFM vs SPY  and my reward has not been received (AD blocked is off) and account tracking has been turned on, this is the second game I’m watching, the second hour of viewing has passed - the reward has not been received :c  Please fix it{{champion:32}}

replies.body: I watched all the games and vods and still no rewards this is annoying, please fix this :(
Yeah, I haven't gotten it either, and I caught UOL vs CG live.  The rewards page even says I watched a game, but I have gotten nothing.
Worlds starts today I believe. So watch a worlds vod
